abstract: Stuart Lehman, a government worker in Albany, founded the Haunting Tour of the state capitol building there eight years ago; Lehman is an expert at relating the Gothic building's dark and spooky past.
snippet: Eight years ago, a state worker started haunted tours of New York’s Capitol, which has enough spooky back story to rival the modern-day foibles of wayward governors and law-breaking legislators.
lead_paragraph: Eight years ago, a state worker started haunted tours of New York’s Capitol, which has enough spooky back story to rival the modern-day foibles of wayward governors and law-breaking legislators.

headline.main: Spending a Night With Ghosts Where Legislators Roam
headline.print_headline: A Night With Ghosts Where Legislators Roam
headline.seo: At Capitol in Albany, Spending an Evening With Ghosts
